files.description: Project configuration defining build system, dependencies, formatting/linting tools, and test runner settings for the refactored experiments modules.
Package initializer exporting the public API for experiments I/O, sweep execution, and plotting utilities.
Shared reusable helpers and small utilities (validation, path handling, typing helpers) used by I/O, plotting, and sweep modules to avoid duplication.
Reusable, well-tested functions for reading/writing sweep inputs and outputs (e.g., configs, results tables, metadata) with consistent schemas and error handling.
Plotting utilities for sweep results (summary plots, per-metric plots, saving figures) implemented as reusable functions with minimal side effects.
Core sweep orchestration code providing a modular API to generate parameter grids, run experiments, collect results, and integrate with I/O and plotting components.
End-to-end and unit tests covering sweep execution, I/O roundtrips, and plotting outputs to ensure the refactor remains correct and stable.
